title: Australian Open: Roger Federer beats Tennys Sandgren in quarter-finals
description: Roger Federer saves seven match points before beating unseeded American Tennys Sandgren in a sensational Australian Open quarter-final.

title: Super Bowl 2020: The NFL Academy & its first students on new path to US game
description: The NFL opened a new academy in north London in September. Its 90 students are the first to step out on a new path towards the USA.

title: Christian Eriksen: Inter Milan complete signing of midfielder from Tottenham
description: Inter Milan complete the signing of Denmark midfielder Christian Eriksen from Tottenham for a fee of around Â£16.9m.

title: Israel Folau: Catalans Dragons sign ex-Australia full-back in cross-code switch
description: Sacked Australia rugby union international Israel Folau makes a cross-code switch back to rugby league with a move to Catalans Dragons.

title: Kieran Trippier talks Diego Simeone, life in Spain, becoming a better defender
description: Atletico Madrid right-back Kieran Trippier talks about life in Spain, playing under Diego Simeone and becoming a better defender.
